title: Robert Hewson was convicted of murdering Gail Tice several years ago.  He was supposed to spend the rest of his life behind bars, but his mugshot has just appeared on your website.  It indicates he has been arrested on a miscellaneous charge.  Whats going on here?
text:
Brian Freskos checked with the New Hanover County jail. Hewson is
still serving his life prison term
(http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20070324/NEWS/703240384), but
was transferred to the jail after being brought to the county to face
an earlier charge. The jailer said it's likely a minor charge
resulting from an incident before he was sent to prison.
